answers.answer: House for Mr. Biswas?...nickname a literary allusion?

question: My pathological test results:2003        28.04.2006     09.08.2006Total Cholestrol   207          239            205LDL                126         171            143Fasting Blood sugar  119         170            109Post meal blood sugar 159        339             92SGOT                               47            72SGPT                  -           94             136GAMA GT               -           483             -Alkaline Phosphate                 174Bilirubin             2.7           less than 1   1.1I have not taken any medication from 2003  till 28.04 2006.Only 30 minutes runing at moderate speed in the morning for 5 days week during these periods.Took Diabetes medicine( GLYNAS M/F 1/2 tablet once in morning) from 29.04.2006 to 07.08.2006, discontinued thereafter. Took cholestrol reducing drug (STORVES - one tablet daily) from 08.05.2006 to 25.07.2006. I have mild echametic heart problem at the lower extermities which was detected in TREADMILL TEST  which showed negative result in STRESS THALIUM TEST. Doctor prescribed ECOSPRIN ( one tablet daily) took from 03.05.2006 to 25.07.2006.I have reduced my weight  druing the period of consumption of medicnine from 90 Kilogram to 78 kilogram.Keeping in view of SGOT, SGPT & GAMAGT, Alkaline Phosphate test results IS MY LEVERall right  or what should do to make it all right. should I start taking Cholestrol reducing drug or will it affect my liver badly.All medicines have been discontinued after 09.08 2006
title: Contolling Fatness in liver and cholestrol
